title: How do I participate in the Open Beta?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am interested in using Unity Collaborate and would to partake in the Open Beta.

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to join the Unity Collaborate Open Beta.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To join the Beta, go to the Collaborate home page and click 'Join now' to download the latest Unity build with Collaborate.

sections.title: More Information
content: We recommend using the most recent version, but if you need access to Unity Collaborate in 5.4, please contact us.
